news.summary: The report also lists the rise of AI among threats to Irish musicians.

news.title: Fontaines D.C. and Inhaler among best-selling vinyl albums in UK for 2025 so far
news.summary: Fontaines D.C. and Niall Horan have also secured spots on the official top 40 best-selling vinyl singles of 2025 so far in the UK.

news.summary: The Galway native has previously collaborated with Conlon on her 2025 single 'Freefalling'
